text: pratiksepa karannan visvasavantayinta “meya yahapatak vasayen tibunahot (meya at kara gænimata) meya kerehi (mema nugat janaya) apata vada idiriyata noyannaha. (mehi kisima yahapatak næta. enisama meya api pratiksepa kara hæriyemu)” yayida pavasannaha. ovun meya (mema satya dharmaya), anugamanaya nokara sitiyadi ‘meya pærani boru prabandha kata’ yayida ovun pavasannaha
